医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
强迫性压力应对行为与大脑多巴胺依赖性习惯系统有关研究人员对大鼠进行了纵向研究，以测量早期形成的烦渴饮酒（或水）与强迫性烦渴饮酒（或水）对双侧输注 α-氟哌噻吨、前背外侧纹状体 (aDLS)-多巴胺 (DA) 受体拮抗剂的敏感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Compulsive-stress-coping-behaviors-linked-to-brains-dopamine-dependent-habit-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Compulsive-stress-coping-behaviors-linked-to-brains-dopamine-dependent-habit-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb55cf10-7f69-4556-90fe-b23158909522 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 10:15:00 -0400 Compulsive stress coping behaviors linked to brain's dopamine-dependent habit system
新研究显示，教幼儿做饭可以增强自控力和健康的饮食习惯研究人员介绍了一项随机对照试验的结果，该试验评估了“Recipe 4 Success”的效果，这是一种在美国威斯康星州和宾夕法尼亚州七个城市、村庄和城镇实施的预防性干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Teaching-toddlers-to-cook-boosts-self-control-and-healthy-eating-habits-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Teaching-toddlers-to-cook-boosts-self-control-and-healthy-eating-habits-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b0a2da3-c2bc-4091-b46e-121d76b3ca80 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 09:46:00 -0400 Teaching toddlers to cook boosts self-control and healthy eating habits, new study reveals
加拿大研究发现，大麻使用障碍与不良心血管事件风险增加约 60% 相关最近发表在《成瘾》杂志上的一项研究评估了大麻使用障碍（CUD）与心血管疾病（CVD）结果的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Cannabis-use-disorder-linked-to-7e6025-higher-risk-of-adverse-cardioangio-events-Canadian-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Cannabis-use-disorder-linked-to-7e6025-higher-risk-of-adverse-cardiovian-events-Canadian-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bd377a5-78f7-4ddc-9176-d2be74f98983 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 09:23:00 -0400 Cannabis use disorder linked to ~60% higher risk of adverse cardiovascular events, Canadian study finds
打破障碍：ANDYSMANCLUB 为男性心理健康而战News Medical 采访了 Luke Tetlow-Cross，他是心理健康慈善机构 ANDYSMANCLUB 的项目开发冠军。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Breaking-Barriers-ANDYSMANCLUBs-Fight-for-Mens-Mental-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Breaking-Barriers-ANDYSMANCLUBs-Fight-for-Mens-Mental-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89f8e349-e329-4473-8bab-4f687a286176 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 09:11:00 -0400 Breaking Barriers: ANDYSMANCLUB's Fight for Men's Mental Health
斯坦福大学领导的关于怀孕期间睡眠和活动的研究强调了早产风险研究人员开发了Series2signal，这是一种新颖、最先进的预测模型，该模型使用孕妇的可穿戴数据来预测孕龄，作为妊娠进展和不良妊娠结局（尤其是早产）可能性的代理。 -检测到母亲睡眠质量和体力活动水平的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Preterm-birth-risk-highlighted-in-Stanford-led-study-on-sleep-and-activity-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Preterm-birth-risk-highlighted-in-Stanford-led-study-on-sleep-and-activity-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51d3377a-16d1-493e-baa8-bd5e6e734118 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 08:32:00 -0400 Preterm birth risk highlighted in Stanford-led study on sleep and activity during pregnancy
新型疫苗可独立于他汀类药物降低低密度脂蛋白胆固醇基于病毒样颗粒 (VLP) 的疫苗针对低密度脂蛋白 (LDL) 受体表位的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Novel-vaccine-lowers-LDL-cholesterol-independent-of-statins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Novel-vaccine-lowers-LDL-cholesterol-independent-of-statins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c595f18-459e-4b8f-8e4c-ff84a2d3eebc Mon, 02 Oct 2023 08:30:00 -0400 Novel vaccine lowers LDL cholesterol independent of statins
新冠病毒长期暴露：患者面临着不同的身体、心理和社会挑战2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 或长期 COVID 的急性后遗症患者经历。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Long-COVID-unmasked-Patients-share-varied-physical-mental-and-social-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Long-COVID-unmasked-Patients-share-varied-physical-mental-and-social-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5b459d2-3ad1-4898-a6ac-6b128929edd6 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 08:08:00 -0400 Long COVID unmasked: Patients share varied physical, mental, and social challenges
预测跨多个祖先的多基因遗传的更好方法研究人员报告了在跨国 GWAS 数据库上使用名为 CT-SLEB 的新型 PRS 计算器获得的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/A-better-method-to-predict-polygenic-inheritance-across-multiple-ancestries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/A-better-method-to-predict-polygenic-inheritance-across-multiple-ancestries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04c10831-7448-4323-94e7-01d653100797 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 07:53:00 -0400 A better method to predict polygenic inheritance across multiple ancestries
产后饮食干预对肥胖女性体重管理的益处研究人员探讨了饮食干预对体重指数较高的产后女性的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Benefits-of-postpartum-dietary-intervention-on-weight-management-in-obese-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Benefits-of-postpartum-dietary-intervention-on-weight-management-in-obese-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72bc13e9-16fe-4441-99d8-39c18b064063 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 07:46:00 -0400 Benefits of postpartum dietary intervention on weight management in obese women
Applied Cells 设立 CellQuest 研究基金以加速多发性骨髓瘤前沿研究Applied Cells 很高兴地宣布 CellQuestGrant 启动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Applied-Cells-opens-CellQuest-Research-Grant-to-accelerate-cutting-edge-multiple-myeloma-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Applied-Cells-opens-CellQuest-Research-Grant-to-accelerate-cutting-edge-multiple-myeloma-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1db8ac93-515c-46d9-a208-9676619f8dea Mon, 02 Oct 2023 07:21:00 -0400 Applied Cells opens CellQuest Research Grant to accelerate cutting-edge multiple myeloma research
